description: Perfect most delicious way to use up left over mash potato!! We absolutely love them.
name: Cheesy Jalapeno Bacon Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Chop bacon into small pieces and fry until cooked. Put aside to cool.
Finely chop jalapeno. Take some seeds or all out depending on the level of spice you like.
Put cold potatoes in a bowl along with the salt, pepper, cheeses, jalapeno and bacon.
Roll into balls and put in the freezer for 10 mins just to firm them up and make it easier to crumb them.
Take balls out and dip into egg mixture then into panko crumbs.
Deep fry at 190 degrees for about 5 minutes or until they are nice and golden and potatoes are hot in the centre. Enjoy the deliciousness.
